title: Galway United » David Hurley
snippet: He was United’s top scorer in 2023 with 21 league goals, helping secure the First Division title. His standout performances earned him Player of the Year and a place in the PFAI Team of the Year. Hurley re-signed for 2025, continuing as a vital part of the squad.

title: David Hurley - FC 26 - Dec 3, 2025 | SoFIFA
snippet: David Hurley (born 21 October 1998) is an Irish footballer who plays as a central attacking midfielder for Irish club Galway United. In the game FC 26, his overall rating is 59.

title: Galway United get past Bohs to earn precious win
snippet: Galway United defeated Bohemians 2-0 at Eamonn Deacy Park thanks to goals in either half by Patrick Hickey and David Hurley.
